text:
Hi Stephen, you can always try PA / coordinator roles straight away. It is slightly more difficult to land there but if you're patient it might work. There are some companies that gather CV for this among other roles (<http://www.productionswitchboardmedia.com/home.asp>)
Or you can check the APA website (<https://www.a-p-a.net/jobs/>) for ideas of what they're looking for and see if you match the skills.
Runner is a good entry level job and again, you get to meet everyone in the studio which help building up working relationship. I had a really good experience running at Passion.
It's up to you really, both will take you there in the end.
